PIC32CX-BZ Zigbee API Reference
Data Fields
ZDO_ComplexDescResp_t Struct Reference

This command is generated by a remote device in response to a Complex_Desc_req directed to the remote device. This command shall be unicast to the originator of the Complex_Desc_req command. More...

#include <zdo.h>

Data Fields

ShortAddr_t nwkAddrOfInterest
 NWK address of the complex descriptor request.
uint8_t length
 Length in bytes of the ComplexDescriptor field.

Detailed Description

This command is generated by a remote device in response to a Complex_Desc_req directed to the remote device. This command shall be unicast to the originator of the Complex_Desc_req command.
